meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Nigeria.
meanings.sent1: In Nigeria, people use nairas to buy things.
meanings.sent2: I exchanged dollars for nairas at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The piggy bank was full of shiny nairas.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth a million nairas.
meanings.sent5: The sound of nairas jingling in his pocket was music to his ears.

meanings.definition: A plural form of the currency unit of Nigeria.
meanings.sent1: She counted the nairas in her wallet.
meanings.sent2: The market was bustling with vendors accepting nairas.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled nairas out of his hat instead of rabbits.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the scent of freshly printed nairas.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter was like a shower of colorful nairas.
